Translations.Text: Ili dir Our Lord ni wronged our anim kaj Vi forgive us hav mercy us ni est losers
Li dir Ir down enemies de 1 another Sur ter est your habitation provision por awhile
Li dir gxi vi viv gxi vi mort el gxi vi est brought out
O infan Adam ni proviz vi garments kovr your korp tro luks! Put garment est garment righteousness. These est kelk da di sign ti ili pren heed

O infan Adam ne let diabl dupe vi as li did when li kauxz eviction your parents Paradise removal their garments expose their korp. Li his gent vid vi, while vi ne seg them. Ni appoint diabl companions de those ne kred
Ili commit gross pek tiam dir Ni trov ni parents doing this DI komand us do gxi. Dir DI neniam advokat pek! Vi dir DI ki vi ne kon
Dir My Lord advokat justice star devoted al Him sol cxiu met worship Vi devote your worship absolutely Him sol. Just as Li iniciat vi vi ultimately ir Him
Kelk Li direkt while others committed straying Ili pren diabl their mastr DI ili kred ke ili direkt
